thread.title: New rules require feds to get warrant for cell phone surveillance
thread.title_full: New rules require feds to get warrant for cell phone surveillance

title: New rules require feds to get warrant for cell phone surveillance
text:
04 New rules require feds to get warrant for cell phone surveillance 
Cnet: Federal law enforcement agencies will have to be more transparent about their use of cell-phone surveillance technology to track criminal suspects, according to a new policy released Thursday by the US Department of Justice.
